title: STUFFED
description:
STUFFED is a procedurally generated, horde first-person shooter , that takes place in the dreams of a little girl. Play as a teddy bear and fight waves of nightmares as you defend your owner. Play solo or join your friends in up to 4 player online co-op. METAL SLUG ATTACK RELOADED
Defend your ownerâ€™s bedroom door and defeat a variety of nightmares in endless waves. Earn points from defeating nightmares and use them to unlock new map areas and weapons.From a popcorn grenade to a jelly bean shotgun, find and use unique weapons made from household objects.
Earn XP in to unlock special player abilities each game session. Use points to unlock new outfits and furs for your teddy bear. Mix and match outfits and furs to fully personalise them.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
